rukus.text: allipeu lam la igeos-eun seongseouimalsseum-eulo jinlileul balghyeojuneun kkulan-ila
amado mid-eum-i eobsneun jadeul-eun geu jasindeul-i iljjigi museullim-i doe eoss-eul geos-eul hago wonhal ttaega olila
geudeul-i meoggo insaeng-eul hyanglaghayeogeudeul-ui somang-i geudeul-eul gippeudolog dula geudeul-i god alge doelila
imi jeonghayeojin gyeyul-i ileujianihan minjog-eul hananim-i myeolmangke haji ani haess-eumyeo
eoneu minjogdo geudeul-ui unmyeong-eul seoduleugeona jiyeonsikil su eobsnola
ittae geudeul-i malhadeola geudae ege kkulan-i gyesidoeeossdani geudaegamichinjaga aninyo
geudaega jinsilhan ja jung-e issda myeon wae cheonsadeul-eul ileuge haji anhneunyo lago hani
hananim-eun jinliui mogjeog-eul wihayeo cheonsadeul-eul bonaess-eul ppun-ila man-il cheonsadeul-i geudeul-ege wassdamyeon geudeul-eun-yuyedoeji moshaess-eulila
hananim-i sillo geu mesejileul gyesihaess-euni hananim-i geugeos-eul bohohalila
geudae ijeon chogi minjog-egedohananim-eun seonjijadeul-eul bonaess-euna
seonjijaga geudeul-ege ileumyeon geudeul-eun oheolyeo geuleul jolonghayeossdeo la
hananim-eun geugeos-i joeindeul-ui ma-eumsog-e deuldolog hayeoss-euna
geudeul-eun geudeul seonjodeul-i myeolmanghan seonlyega iss-eum-edo geugeos-eul midji anhdeola
hananim-i geudeul-ege haneul-ui mun-eul yeol-eo geudeul-i geugos-eul hyanghayeo oleuge handa hayeodo
geudeul-eun teullim-eobs-i uliui nundeul-i dochwidoeeo uliga masul-e geol lyeo iss-eul ppun-ilago malhal geos-ila
